short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the number of open tabs and windows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the number of open tabs and windows in a visible and accessible way, tidy your life. Great way to create awareness if you're suffering from many open tabs and windows all the time.
